name: 尹秦清
objective:
With the development of internet technology, vigorous internet entrepreneurship has challenged traditional physical stores and provided huge opportunities in the modern business environment. new digital technologies and mobile devices do not only change our lives but also change consumers' behavior and communication channels. This course combines innovation and entrepreneurship with the business environment in the digital age, including business strategy, innovative thinking, and entrepreneurship. This course will introduce online entrepreneurship concepts, approaches, and practices. learning objectives mainly include:
1. Identify the online business opportunities in digital times.
2. Understand innovative concepts and business models.
3. Discuss online business operations and marketing.
4. Learn to write an online business plan.
5. Prepare to participate in entrepreneurship competitions.
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction
Week 2: Concept of entrepreneurship
Week 3: Business opportunities in digital times I
Week 4: Business opportunities in digital times II
Week 5: Financial Planning for Entrepreneurs
Week 6: Entrepreneurial Teams
Week 7: Innovative thinking and business models I
Week 8: Innovative thinking and business models II
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Go-to-market (GTM) strategy I
Week 11: Go-to-market (GTM) strategy II
Week 12: Entrepreneurship marketing tactics I
Week 13: Entrepreneurship marketing tactics II
Week 14: Customer needs and internet consumer behavior I
Week 15: Customer needs and internet consumer behavior II
Week 16: How to write an internet business plan I
Week 17: Final report (PPT presentation)
Week 18: Holiday for Dragon Boat Festival
scorePolicy:
1. Attendance & Class Participation: 20% 
2. Case Study Presentation: 20%
3. Midterm Exam: 30%
4. Final Report: 30%
